Headline: #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Harrison/Jefferson
ShortDescription: Eastbound 60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted via Harrison, Halsted, Monroe and Canal due to, street blockage near Harrison/Jefferson.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted via Harrison, Halsted, Monroe and Canal due to, street blockage near Harrison/Jefferson.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #7 Harrison Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Harrison/Jefferson
ShortDescription: Eastbound 7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted via Harrison, Halsted and Jackson: due to, street blockage near Harrison/Jefferson.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted via Harrison, Halsted and Jackson: due to, street blockage near Harrison/Jefferson.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays from the area of Forest Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays from the area of Forest Park.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
